channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Stock Indexes Slide, Bond Yields Jump After Jobs Report
item.description: Stock indexes fell, with the S&P 500 wiping out its 2025 gains, as investors assessed a blockbuster jobs report that makes future interest-rate cuts s...

item.title: World's biggest chipmaker TSMC posts record 2024 revenue as AI boost continues
item.description: TSMC manufacturers semiconductors for some of the world's biggest companies from Apple to Nvidia.

item.title: Constellation Energy Agrees to Buy Calpine for $16.4 Billion
item.description: The merger combines two of the country’s largest power generators as demand for electricity surges.

item.title: Walgreens shares soar 27% on big earnings beat, as drugstore chain cuts costs
item.description: Walgreens maintained its fiscal 2025 adjusted earnings guidance, but did not include a sales outlook in its release.

item.title: Lucid reports record quarterly vehicle deliveries, meets production target
item.description: Lucid Group on Monday reported record quarterly vehicle deliveries for the fourth quarter and confirmed production of more than 9,000 vehicles in 2024...

item.title: SEC, Shift4 Payments Reach Disclosure-Violation Settlement
item.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission reached a $750,000 settlement with Shift4 Payments, resolving allegations that the payments-technology company ...

item.title: Judge Rules American Airlines Violated Retirement-Plan Duties by Encouraging ESG Investing
item.description: The company’s 401(k) plan was found to favor socially conscious goals over financial returns.

item.title: Delta outlook tops estimates as CEO expects 2025 to be airline's 'best financial year in our history'
item.description: Delta's CEO said strong travel demand is driving revenue higher.

item.title: Corona brewer gets slammed post-earnings, and we question whether to keep the stock
item.description: This was not the quarter we were looking for — and unfortunately, we see little reason to defend Constellation brands.

item.title: Founder of Private-Equity Firm Backed by Wealthy Families Settles With SEC
item.description: Hendrik Jordaan agreed to pay a $250,000 civil penalty but didn’t admit or deny the regulator’s findings.
